/*
00000_000_0000_0001 // ADD R0<=R0+R1  
00001_001_0000_0001 // SUB R1<=R0-R1 
00010_010_0000_0001 // AND R2<=R0&R1
00011_010_0000_0001 // OR R2<=R0|R1
00100_010_0000_0001 // XOR R2<=R0^R1 
00101_000_0000_0001 // INV R0
00110_000_0001_0001 // SHL R0<<R1
00111_001_0000_0000 // MOV R1<=R0
01000_001_0000_0101 // LDI R1<=05
01001_000_0000_0001 // JZ label
01010_000_0000_0001 // INC R0
01011_000_0000_0001 // DEC R0 
01100_001_0000_0001 // HLT
01101_000_0000_0001 // JC label
01110_001_0000_0011 // JNZ R1,abvline
01111_000_0000_0010 // JMP 
10000_000_0000_1000 // LDM R0
10001_000_0000_1000 // STM R0  
*/

/*
00000_000_0000_0001 // ADD R0<=R0+R1  
00000_000_0000_0010 // ADD R0<=R0+R2
00000_000_0000_0011 // ADD R0<=R0+R3
00000_000_0001_0000 // ADD R0<=R1+R0
00000_000_0001_0010 // ADD R0<=R1+R2
00000_000_0001_0011 // ADD R0<=R1+R3 
00000_000_0010_0000 // ADD R0<=R2+R0
00000_000_0010_0001 // ADD R0<=R2+R1  
00000_000_0010_0011 // ADD R0<=R2+R3
00000_000_0011_0000 // ADD R0<=R3+R0
00000_000_0011_0001 // ADD R0<=R3+R1 
00000_000_0011_0010 // ADD R0<=R3+R2 

00000_001_0000_0001 // ADD R1<=R0+R1  
00000_001_0000_0010 // ADD R1<=R0+R2
00000_001_0000_0011 // ADD R1<=R0+R3
00000_001_0001_0000 // ADD R1<=R1+R0
00000_001_0001_0010 // ADD R1<=R1+R2
00000_001_0001_0011 // ADD R1<=R1+R3 
00000_001_0010_0000 // ADD R1<=R2+R0
00000_001_0010_0001 // ADD R1<=R2+R1  
00000_001_0010_0011 // ADD R1<=R2+R3
00000_001_0011_0000 // ADD R1<=R3+R0
00000_001_0011_0001 // ADD R1<=R3+R1 
00000_001_0011_0010 // ADD R1<=R3+R2 

00000_010_0000_0001 // ADD R2<=R0+R1  
00000_010_0000_0010 // ADD R2<=R0+R2
00000_010_0000_0011 // ADD R2<=R0+R3
00000_010_0001_0000 // ADD R2<=R1+R0
00000_010_0001_0010 // ADD R2<=R1+R2
00000_010_0001_0011 // ADD R2<=R1+R3 
00000_010_0010_0000 // ADD R2<=R2+R0
00000_010_0010_0001 // ADD R2<=R2+R1  
00000_010_0010_0011 // ADD R2<=R2+R3
00000_010_0011_0000 // ADD R2<=R3+R0
00000_010_0011_0001 // ADD R2<=R3+R1 
00000_010_0011_0010 // ADD R2<=R3+R2 

00000_011_0000_0001 // ADD R3<=R0+R1  
00000_011_0000_0010 // ADD R3<=R0+R2
00000_011_0000_0011 // ADD R3<=R0+R3
00000_011_0001_0000 // ADD R3<=R1+R0
00000_011_0001_0010 // ADD R3<=R1+R2
00000_011_0001_0011 // ADD R3<=R1+R3 
00000_011_0010_0000 // ADD R3<=R2+R0
00000_011_0010_0001 // ADD R3<=R2+R1  
00000_011_0010_0011 // ADD R3<=R2+R3
00000_011_0011_0000 // ADD R3<=R3+R0
00000_011_0011_0001 // ADD R3<=R3+R1 
00000_011_0011_0010 // ADD R3<=R3+R2 



00001_000_0000_0001 // SUB R0<=R0+R1  
00001_000_0000_0010 // SUB R0<=R0+R2
00001_000_0000_0011 // SUB R0<=R0+R3
00001_000_0001_0000 // SUB R0<=R1+R0
00001_000_0001_0010 // SUB R0<=R1+R2
00001_000_0001_0011 // SUB R0<=R1+R3 
00001_000_0010_0000 // SUB R0<=R2+R0
00001_000_0010_0001 // SUB R0<=R2+R1  
00001_000_0010_0011 // SUB R0<=R2+R3
00001_000_0011_0000 // SUB R0<=R3+R0
00001_000_0011_0001 // SUB R0<=R3+R1 
00001_000_0011_0010 // SUB R0<=R3+R2 

00001_001_0000_0001 // SUB R1<=R0+R1  
00001_001_0000_0010 // SUB R1<=R0+R2
00001_001_0000_0011 // SUB R1<=R0+R3
00001_001_0001_0000 // SUB R1<=R1+R0
00001_001_0001_0010 // SUB R1<=R1+R2
00001_001_0001_0011 // SUB R1<=R1+R3 
00001_001_0010_0000 // SUB R1<=R2+R0
00001_001_0010_0001 // SUB R1<=R2+R1  
00001_001_0010_0011 // SUB R1<=R2+R3
00001_001_0011_0000 // SUB R1<=R3+R0
00001_001_0011_0001 // SUB R1<=R3+R1 
00001_001_0011_0010 // SUB R1<=R3+R2 

00001_010_0000_0001 // SUB R2<=R0+R1  
00001_010_0000_0010 // SUB R2<=R0+R2
00001_010_0000_0011 // SUB R2<=R0+R3
00001_010_0001_0000 // SUB R2<=R1+R0
00001_010_0001_0010 // SUB R2<=R1+R2
00001_010_0001_0011 // SUB R2<=R1+R3 
00001_010_0010_0000 // SUB R2<=R2+R0
00001_010_0010_0001 // SUB R2<=R2+R1  
00001_010_0010_0011 // SUB R2<=R2+R3
00001_010_0011_0000 // SUB R2<=R3+R0
00001_010_0011_0001 // SUB R2<=R3+R1 
00001_010_0011_0010 // SUB R2<=R3+R2 

00001_011_0000_0001 // SUB R3<=R0+R1  
00001_011_0000_0010 // SUB R3<=R0+R2
00001_011_0000_0011 // SUB R3<=R0+R3
00001_011_0001_0000 // SUB R3<=R1+R0
00001_011_0001_0010 // SUB R3<=R1+R2
00001_011_0001_0011 // SUB R3<=R1+R3 
00001_011_0010_0000 // SUB R3<=R2+R0
00001_011_0010_0001 // SUB R3<=R2+R1  
00001_011_0010_0011 // SUB R3<=R2+R3
00001_011_0011_0000 // SUB R3<=R3+R0
00001_011_0011_0001 // SUB R3<=R3+R1 
00001_011_0011_0010 // SUB R3<=R3+R2 



00100_000_0000_0001 // XOR R0<=R0+R1  
00100_000_0000_0010 // XOR R0<=R0+R2
00100_000_0000_0011 // XOR R0<=R0+R3
00100_000_0001_0000 // XOR R0<=R1+R0
00100_000_0001_0010 // XOR R0<=R1+R2
00100_000_0001_0011 // XOR R0<=R1+R3 
00100_000_0010_0000 // XOR R0<=R2+R0
00100_000_0010_0001 // XOR R0<=R2+R1  
00100_000_0010_0011 // XOR R0<=R2+R3
00100_000_0011_0000 // XOR R0<=R3+R0
00100_000_0011_0001 // XOR R0<=R3+R1 
00100_000_0011_0010 // XOR R0<=R3+R2 

00100_001_0000_0001 // XOR R1<=R0+R1  
00100_001_0000_0010 // XOR R1<=R0+R2
00100_001_0000_0011 // XOR R1<=R0+R3
00100_001_0001_0000 // XOR R1<=R1+R0
00100_001_0001_0010 // XOR R1<=R1+R2
00100_001_0001_0011 // XOR R1<=R1+R3 
00100_001_0010_0000 // XOR R1<=R2+R0
00100_001_0010_0001 // XOR R1<=R2+R1  
00100_001_0010_0011 // XOR R1<=R2+R3
00100_001_0011_0000 // XOR R1<=R3+R0
00100_001_0011_0001 // XOR R1<=R3+R1 
00100_001_0011_0010 // XOR R1<=R3+R2 

00100_010_0000_0001 // XOR R2<=R0+R1  
00100_010_0000_0010 // XOR R2<=R0+R2
00100_010_0000_0011 // XOR R2<=R0+R3
00100_010_0001_0000 // XOR R2<=R1+R0
00100_010_0001_0010 // XOR R2<=R1+R2
00100_010_0001_0011 // XOR R2<=R1+R3 
00100_010_0010_0000 // XOR R2<=R2+R0
00100_010_0010_0001 // XOR R2<=R2+R1  
00100_010_0010_0011 // XOR R2<=R2+R3
00100_010_0011_0000 // XOR R2<=R3+R0
00100_010_0011_0001 // XOR R2<=R3+R1 
00100_010_0011_0010 // XOR R2<=R3+R2 

00001_011_0000_0001 // XOR R3<=R0+R1  
00001_011_0000_0010 // XOR R3<=R0+R2
00001_011_0000_0011 // XOR R3<=R0+R3
00001_011_0001_0000 // XOR R3<=R1+R0
00001_011_0001_0010 // XOR R3<=R1+R2
00001_011_0001_0011 // XOR R3<=R1+R3 
00001_011_0010_0000 // XOR R3<=R2+R0
00001_011_0010_0001 // XOR R3<=R2+R1  
00001_011_0010_0011 // XOR R3<=R2+R3
00001_011_0011_0000 // XOR R3<=R3+R0
00001_011_0011_0001 // XOR R3<=R3+R1 
00001_011_0011_0010 // XOR R3<=R3+R2 

00011_000_0000_0001 // OR R0<=R0+R1  
00011_000_0000_0010 // OR R0<=R0+R2
00011_000_0000_0011 // OR R0<=R0+R3
00011_000_0001_0000 // OR R0<=R1+R0
00011_000_0001_0010 // OR R0<=R1+R2
00011_000_0001_0011 // OR R0<=R1+R3 
00011_000_0010_0000 // OR R0<=R2+R0
00011_000_0010_0001 // OR R0<=R2+R1  
00011_000_0010_0011 // OR R0<=R2+R3
00011_000_0011_0000 // OR R0<=R3+R0
00011_000_0011_0001 // OR R0<=R3+R1 
00011_000_0011_0010 // OR R0<=R3+R2 

00011_001_0000_0001 // OR R1<=R0+R1  
00011_001_0000_0010 // OR R1<=R0+R2
00011_001_0000_0011 // OR R1<=R0+R3
00011_001_0001_0000 // OR R1<=R1+R0
00011_001_0001_0010 // OR R1<=R1+R2
00011_001_0001_0011 // OR R1<=R1+R3 
00011_001_0010_0000 // OR R1<=R2+R0
00011_001_0010_0001 // OR R1<=R2+R1  
00011_001_0010_0011 // OR R1<=R2+R3
00011_001_0011_0000 // OR R1<=R3+R0
00011_001_0011_0001 // OR R1<=R3+R1 
00011_001_0011_0010 // OR R1<=R3+R2 

00011_010_0000_0001 // OR R2<=R0+R1  
00011_010_0000_0010 // OR R2<=R0+R2
00011_010_0000_0011 // OR R2<=R0+R3
00011_010_0001_0000 // OR R2<=R1+R0
00011_010_0001_0010 // OR R2<=R1+R2
00011_010_0001_0011 // OR R2<=R1+R3 
00011_010_0010_0000 // OR R2<=R2+R0
00011_010_0010_0001 // OR R2<=R2+R1  
00011_010_0010_0011 // OR R2<=R2+R3
00011_010_0011_0000 // OR R2<=R3+R0
00011_010_0011_0001 // OR R2<=R3+R1 
00011_010_0011_0010 // OR R2<=R3+R2 

00011_011_0000_0001 // OR R3<=R0+R1  
00011_011_0000_0010 // OR R3<=R0+R2
00011_011_0000_0011 // OR R3<=R0+R3
00011_011_0001_0000 // OR R3<=R1+R0
00011_011_0001_0010 // OR R3<=R1+R2
00011_011_0001_0011 // OR R3<=R1+R3 
00011_011_0010_0000 // OR R3<=R2+R0
00011_011_0010_0001 // OR R3<=R2+R1  
00011_011_0010_0011 // OR R3<=R2+R3
00011_011_0011_0000 // OR R3<=R3+R0
00011_011_0011_0001 // OR R3<=R3+R1 
00011_011_0011_0010 // OR R3<=R3+R2 



00010_000_0000_0001 // AND R0<=R0+R1  
00010_000_0000_0010 // AND R0<=R0+R2
00010_000_0000_0011 // AND R0<=R0+R3
00010_000_0001_0000 // AND R0<=R1+R0
00010_000_0001_0010 // AND R0<=R1+R2
00010_000_0001_0011 // AND R0<=R1+R3 
00010_000_0010_0000 // AND R0<=R2+R0
00010_000_0010_0001 // AND R0<=R2+R1  
00010_000_0010_0011 // AND R0<=R2+R3
00010_000_0011_0000 // AND R0<=R3+R0
00010_000_0011_0001 // AND R0<=R3+R1 
00010_000_0011_0010 // AND R0<=R3+R2 

00010_001_0000_0001 // AND R1<=R0+R1  
00010_001_0000_0010 // AND R1<=R0+R2
00010_001_0000_0011 // AND R1<=R0+R3
00010_001_0001_0000 // AND R1<=R1+R0
00010_001_0001_0010 // AND R1<=R1+R2
00010_001_0001_0011 // AND R1<=R1+R3 
00010_001_0010_0000 // AND R1<=R2+R0
00010_001_0010_0001 // AND R1<=R2+R1  
00010_001_0010_0011 // AND R1<=R2+R3
00010_001_0011_0000 // AND R1<=R3+R0
00010_001_0011_0001 // AND R1<=R3+R1 
00010_001_0011_0010 // AND R1<=R3+R2 

00010_010_0000_0001 // AND R2<=R0+R1  
00010_010_0000_0010 // AND R2<=R0+R2
00010_010_0000_0011 // AND R2<=R0+R3
00010_010_0001_0000 // AND R2<=R1+R0
00010_010_0001_0010 // AND R2<=R1+R2
00010_010_0001_0011 // AND R2<=R1+R3 
00010_010_0010_0000 // AND R2<=R2+R0
00010_010_0010_0001 // AND R2<=R2+R1  
00010_010_0010_0011 // AND R2<=R2+R3
00010_010_0011_0000 // AND R2<=R3+R0
00010_010_0011_0001 // AND R2<=R3+R1 
00010_010_0011_0010 // AND R2<=R3+R2 

00010_011_0000_0001 // AND R3<=R0+R1  
00010_011_0000_0010 // AND R3<=R0+R2
00010_011_0000_0011 // AND R3<=R0+R3
00010_011_0001_0000 // AND R3<=R1+R0
00010_011_0001_0010 // AND R3<=R1+R2
00010_011_0001_0011 // AND R3<=R1+R3 
00010_011_0010_0000 // AND R3<=R2+R0
00010_011_0010_0001 // AND R3<=R2+R1  
00010_011_0010_0011 // AND R3<=R2+R3
00010_011_0011_0000 // AND R3<=R3+R0
00010_011_0011_0001 // AND R3<=R3+R1 
00010_011_0011_0010 // AND R3<=R3+R2 


00101_000_0000_0001 // INV R0
00101_001_0000_0001 // INV R1
00101_010_0000_0001 // INV R2
00101_011_0000_0001 // INV R3

01010_000_0000_0001 // INC R0
01010_001_0000_0001 // INC R1
01010_010_0000_0001 // INC R2
01010_011_0000_0001 // INC R3

01011_000_0000_0001 // DEC R0 
01011_001_0000_0001 // DEC R1
01011_010_0000_0001 // DEC R2
01011_011_0000_0001 // DEC R3


00110_000_0001_0001 // SHL R0<<R1
00110_000_0010_0001 // SHL R0<<R2
00110_000_0011_0001 // SHL R0<<R3
00110_001_0000_0001 // SHL R1<<R0
00110_001_0010_0001 // SHL R1<<R2
00110_001_0011_0001 // SHL R1<<R3
00110_010_0000_0001 // SHL R2<<R0
00110_010_0001_0001 // SHL R2<<R1
00110_010_0011_0001 // SHL R2<<R3
00110_011_0000_0001 // SHL R3<<R0
00110_011_0001_0001 // SHL R3<<R1
00110_011_0010_0001 // SHL R3<<R2

00111_000_0001_0001 // MOV R0<<R1
00111_000_0010_0001 // MOV R0<<R2
00111_000_0011_0001 // MOV R0<<R3
00111_001_0000_0001 // MOV R1<<R0
00111_001_0010_0001 // MOV R1<<R2
00111_001_0011_0001 // MOV R1<<R3
00111_010_0000_0001 // MOV R2<<R0
00111_010_0001_0001 // MOV R2<<R1
00111_010_0011_0001 // MOV R2<<R3
00111_011_0000_0001 // MOV R3<<R0
00111_011_0001_0001 // MOV R3<<R1
00111_011_0010_0001 // MOV R3<<R2

01000_000_0000_0101 // LDI R0=8 bit
01000_001_0000_0101 // LDI R1=8 bit
01000_010_0000_0101 // LDI R2=8 bit
01000_011_0000_0101 // LDI R3=8 bit

01110_000_0000_0011 // JNZ R0,abvline
01110_001_0000_0011 // JNZ R1,abvline
01110_010_0000_0011 // JNZ R2,abvline
01110_011_0000_0011 // JNZ R3,abvline
